articles.content: Apple is testing a iPhone 16 Pro hole punch version, but it may not be finalized. Details will depend on March next year. I guess most likely we won't see such a version until the iPhone 17 pic.twitt… [+64 chars]

articles.author: Adi Robertson
articles.title: Epic v. Google: everything we're learning live in Fortnite court - The Verge
articles.description: Updates in Epic v. Google, an antitrust trial over whether Android’s Google Play store constitutes an unlawful monopoly.
articles.content: The future of Googles app store is at stake in a lawsuit by Fortnite publisher Epic Games. Epic sued Google in 2020 after a fight over in-app purchase fees, claiming the Android operating systems Goo… [+15826 chars]
